name: Sample Card Name
description: When any player acquires a resource, you can acquire a resource as well
flavor: Flavor text is an amazing thing, if you can find space for it.

description: When any player acquires a resource, you can acquire a resource as well
Exile a galaxy card
No one can acquire Galaxy Resources until your next turn
Increase all galaxy cards costs by 2
Reserve a galaxy card until you play again
You can play cards faced down (reveal it at the beginning of your next turn)
Use a galaxy card this turn only as if it was yours

name: Research Center
description: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and put them back in any order

name: Escort Ship
description: Play this card for free any time you play a Military card
Any time you play a military card, you can play another military card

name: Banner Ship
description: Add +1 Power to all military units in the same row

name: Rigged Ship
description: Sacrifice this unit to gain 4 military power this turn
This unit's Military Power is equal to the Military Power of the unit on it's left +1
When this unit is deployed, each other player sacrifices a unit with less Military Power
When this unit is deployed, each other player sacrifices a unit with more Military Power

name: Military Commander
description: All your powers become military
flavor: It isn't difficult to turn anything into a weapon.

name: Armored Convoy
flavor: An impenetrable war machine can be very convincing.

name: Prison
description: Each other player destroys one deployed unit
Exile a card from your hand to acquire any Galaxy card without paying its costs
When you acquire a Galaxy card, you may exile a card from your hand to acquire another galaxy card

name: Refinery
description: Every time you draw a card, draw another card

name: Commerce Office
description: Whenever you acquire a Galaxy card, draw a card

name: Supply Ship
description: Draw a card

name: Recycling Center
description: Return a card from your discard pile to your hand

name: Renovation Center
description: Return an exiled card to your discard pile

name: Powered Defence Laser
description: This unit's Military Power is the sum of adjacent's units Trade Power
